name: Sunubus
product_desc:
Sunubus is a collaborative mobile application for bus localization. Indeed, most solutions proposed in this area are subject to a heavy initial investment and a painful maintenance. Sunubus responds to this problem by motivating everyone to use their phone as a means of locating transmission lines.

The operating principle is simple:
- Modou, passenger of line 5, shares his position in real time via SunuBus
- Fatou pays with her phone credit in order to access it.
- Once Fatou gets on the bus, Modou receives points that he can subsequently exchange for gifts (credit, internet pass, ...)

Sunubus is the only technology to offer a reliable bus tracking service with no deployment or maintenance costs.
high_concept: Sunubus is a collaborative mobile application for bus localization and transport lines

name: faymashop
product_desc:
As the banking rate is still low in Africa, it is difficult to see that the majority of people living south of the SAHARA can not make online purchases. Nevertheless, the transactions not included in the calculation of economic aggregates are estimated at $ 5 million per month for only Senegal.
Faymashop brings a solution that creates a space of purchase and sale online allowing all non bank people to make purchases online thanks to mobile money.
We also offer our robust platform the possibility for Ecommerants to refer their products on the search engines but also to keep a regular and complete account.
Faymashop is therefore a platform of Ecommerce adapted to the realities of the African continent
high_concept: Faymashop is a multivendor ecommerce platform designed for Africa

name: Bonergie SARL
product_desc:
Bonergie is a social business in Senegal. We offer our customers a wide range of products based on solar energy, providing them with access to light, electricity and water.
The Bonergie products have been developed especially for those regions that have no connection to the local power grid. Access to energy gives people the capacity to act. Their quality of life increases and they have the opportunity to generate income. Thanks to flexible payment plans, all Bonergie products can be acquired independently. Our customers generate their own electricity exactly where it is needed. This gives them independence and allows them to plan both their lives and work.Our range of products comprising decentralised solar solutions covers almost every requirement. Families, small and medium-sized enterprises, communal facilities such as schools and hospitals, as well as agricultural firms can all find sustainable solutions with Bonergie.
high_concept: Bonergie is a Social Business in Senegal for rural electrification with Solar Energy

name: BlippyNote
product_desc:
Blippynote is a location-based social network that uses your location to connect you to people and places around. No need to follow users.

You can simply post a "note" in a specific area and people near that location can read and interact with your note. You can also read notes written anywhere in the world.

With Blippynote you can connect to local communities, engage in great discussions; find or share interesting events, discover new places all over the world.

Founded in 2012 by three young Senegalese engineers based on a simple observation: There is no solution or offer professional and structured to meet the needs of PME, large corporate and short of the company. Thus the idea of ​​setting up a structured and innovative organization was born. Heart of our business is IT and the wider development of IT solutions and security (jid Info). However the jid group includes three other departments namely the graphics (Graff jid), communication & management (Jid IMC) and social (Jid Sos). Our new technology integration expertise to develop the business allows us to be a leader in all these areas. By joining our clients you will be part of these companies that have found more than a service provider but a partner.

name: Thalweg Invest, inc.,
product_desc:
At present I have received a sales offer from Mali, 75 kg.

Sales price: 15 000 000 fcfa (22867.35 euros).

Export fees: 7%, Cost of purchase:  (22867.35 * 75) * 1.07. price in usd per kg: 

22867.35*1.08626 = $24839.89

Buyer will purchase at 16.5% discount of the gold price;

If I refer to this chart the gold is : 34867.48; at a discount of 16.5% per kg =$29114.35 

Gross margin will be: $(29114.35 - 24839.89) * 75 = $320584.5

The quantity I will purchase will depend on the funds i have to invest in the business.
And I will divide profit equally between investor and myself.

depending on the funds i have, i can either start by paying only export fees, or i purchase 5kg.

in any event, i have solid partnership with the buyer who has his refinery in Austria.  

the sales price is very competitive and will allow to make a decent profit.

i can manage to export each year 75 kg or 100 kg.
high_concept: to export gold to europe, usa

name: Spoteat
product_desc:
Spoteat is a perfect blend of Yelp and OpenTable. With this mobile application  people visiting or living in Africa starting with Senegal Nigeria, Ghana and Ivory Coast, will be able to have reviews on local restaurants and make bookings using a very simple and intuitive interface.

Our application is multilingual with French, English, Spanish and Mandarin in our first version and w are planning on adding more.

With Spoteat reviewing and booking for a restaurant in Africa becomes as easy as eating a piece of cake.

name: Cadochic
product_desc:
Cadochic est une carte cadeau multienseigne, multithematiques, multicanal utilisable en une ou plusieurs fois dans des magasins partenaires.
Les consommateurs sénégalais manquent souvent d'idées cadeau, de temps ou ont peur de décevoir le bénéficiaire du cadeau. J'ai donc pensé à la petite carte cadeau qui laisse à son bénéficiaire un large choix de magasins ou thématiques où il pourra dépenser sa carte cadeau comme il le souhaite (jusqu'à épuisement du solde de la carte).
Le produit est destiné aux particuliers et aux entreprises.

name: KankanMusa
product_desc:
AfricaB2B, is a two-sided marketplace that links African construction companies and suppliers from all over the world, offering secured transactions, pre-sale and after-sale services. Unlike the representatives of constructors in Africa, we will offer a wide range of brands and equipment and an elaborated searching tools to match all the needs from small companies to big international companies.
We will develop services to bring all the construction equipment available worldwide to the African market and offer:
• 	Online searching platform, with assistance to find the needs 
•      	Logistics service
•       	Warranty, and maintenance on equipment.

Combining the power of internet to connect people from everywhere in the world and the local expertise in finding equipment, AfricaB2B differentiates itself from its competitors in the openness of the platform and the services included to allow the companies to get rid of the struggles they are facing now to find the proper equipment.
high_concept: two-sided marketplace platform for Africa + Online to Offline
company_type: Startup, Early Stage, Marketplace , E Commerce

name: W-charging
Rapid Performance Senegal
product_desc:
Despite multiple, innovative, financial solutions in Africa, poverty alleviation is still unattainable.  Two key factors (a) lack of trust; (b) inability to make scalable, credit-based decisions has hampered this effort.  This has impacted all areas and sections of society: farmers can’t buy machinery, entrepreneurs can’t get loans, the sick cannot buy medication etc.

Our solution, LaTontine, digitizes a centuries old, peer-to-peer savings system with millions of users called Tontine in Francophone Africa; creating a mobile financial services platform with an inbuilt credit scoring system.

The ultimate goal is to work with a variety of partners to create a bundled services model while profiting from the social network effect of scale, customer trust & intimacy, and purchasing power.  

Potential services for our members incl. a smartphone purchasing program, pediatric prescription drug plan, lending (banks need a scalabable credit scoring system), fertilizer purchasing program etc.
high_concept: Mobile Financial Platform for Developing World

name: Shopmeaway
product_desc:
It is a common ageement that consumption governs the world. People work, get paid and pay for their basic needs and culture and entertainment.
In western countries, the only limitation to consumption is the purchase power.
In Africa, even with sufficient purchase power, people are limited in their consumption because of the rare supply.
By making it posssible for any senegalese to buy on any website in the world, we enlarge the possibility of suppliers to an infinity. Therefore, the prices decrease and the quality is improved. Many of our ustomers cannot actually believe it when they receive the article they have always wanted, fast and at reasonable cost. By optimizing the costs of certain expenses, we make it possible for them to buy more things , more valuable to their well beeing. For example buying a specific book for a student or doctor is simple and easy on Amazon through Shopmeaway. Mothers can also buy top quality clothes to their children.
high_concept: Enable african consumers to shop online from european / american websites

name: africoin
product_desc:
The project focuses on the development of digital services exclusively wearing bitcoins as a payment system because these services will consist of.: 
-From a system of transferring money bitcoin via a web platform and mobile outlets, offering functionality and portfolio management Bitcoin Bitcoin exchange / CFA. 
Knowing that Statistics of the World Bank, specifies that remittances abroad Africa reached 40 billion Euros in 2013, and that in Africa, we pay the highest transfer fees can go up 12.5%. 
An alarming situation, and I think Bitcoin is the alternative to this problem, because to transfer money to a relative you only need to specify your Bitcoin address and possibly any payment is the location near and so secure, simple, and low cost.
high_concept: The project involves the creation of a system of money transfer

name: Keewigo Travel
product_desc:
AS a travel agency, we will provide the services listed below: air ticketing, train and boat tickets. There will also be theater seats for sale, travel insurance (specially because its mandatory for Schengen embassies), hotel room booking, transfers from airport to hotel, car booking and packages with all inclusive options.
The more particular services we will provide are:
- the visa package. Its very demanded and there is no travel agency able to provide it in this market. It will consist in collecting the embassies visa informations, to collect the required documents from de corporate customer, and make the file ready to be submitted. 
- the VIP service, with airport assistance inbound and outbound. This service will be proposed to corporate and business/first class passengers. they use to be short of time, and this assistance will help them save some. This will be planned with the airport authorities to have access to arrival and departure zones.

name: International Hostel Dakar
product_desc:
WHAT?

IHDakar is an opportunity to serve visitors as the first Eco-Hostel in Senegal. Our cause, "Setal" places street trash containers in communities while offering jobs.

WHERE?

Senegal's major city and capital: Dakar

WHO?

Majority of tourists travel from Europe, Asia and the United States. Our average customer is in their early 30's from abroad. 

WHY?

With IHDakar, we can participate in the economic development of Dakar with an increase in business and jobs for locals. While bringing opportunity, we also make it easier on wallets with a large number of travelers consistently seeking affordable accommodations in an overpriced, old fashioned hotel industry. In offering an eco-friendly environment, we challenge the outdated patterns. 

Add "Setal" five years later, and we can assist in pollution reduction, and bring care for the environment for future generations in Senegal.
